title: Am I the only one the Screensaver doesn't work for?
body:
When I use the Mac OS X version of the LoL screensaver (even after reinstalling), the screensaver always either has no pictures at all, or a particular set of 3-4.

I can select the pics I want in the options app... and it will sit there and download gigabytes worth of pictures... but when the screensaver triggers, it's again those same few pics, or none.

And then it brings up that notification that there's more new art available.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

I've downloaded the whole set of art over and over. I've noticed, actually, that if I leave that options app open, the screensaver works as normal... but the moment I close it, it forgets all the pics again.

It's frustrating, cause this is my favourite screensaver, and I love the league art. Anyone able to suggest a fix?
